```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(lubridate)
```

## Data 

```{r}
q1 <- read_csv("../../../../courses/EDS214/topatopa/data/QuebradaCuenca1-Bisley.csv", na = "-9999")

q2 <- read_csv("../../../../courses/EDS214/topatopa/data/QuebradaCuenca2-Bisley.csv", na = "-9999")

q3 <- read_csv("../../../../courses/EDS214/topatopa/data/QuebradaCuenca3-Bisley.csv", na = "-9999")

mpr <- read_csv("../../../../courses/EDS214/topatopa/data/RioMameyesPuenteRoto.csv", na = "-9999")
```

## Wrangling

```{r}
q1_clean <- q1 %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(sample_date = lubridate::mdy(sample_date)) 

q2_clean <- q2 %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(sample_date = lubridate::mdy_hm(sample_date)) 

q3_clean <- q3 %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(sample_date = lubridate::mdy(sample_date)) 

mpr_clean <- mpr %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(sample_date = lubridate::mdy(sample_date)) 
```
